Community

Join our Discord Server!

By joining our ISACA Discord server, you'll gain access to a wealth of information related to IT governance, risk management, information security, and cybersecurity. Connect with fellow students, industry professionals, and faculty members, and stay informed about club activities, events, and resources. Join here!
